", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:
w: world
this: nid
l: Ordered.sort Label

Goal:
network_rely s s' -> find m (dsoup (gets s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')

Premises:
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
network_rely = fun s1 s2 : state => exists n : nat, network_rely' n s1 s2 : state -> state -> Prop
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
from : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Notation gets := getStatelet
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (EqType T (base c)). Record type : Type := Pack {
step_send_other : forall (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (gets s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
rely_consume_other : forall (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely s s' -> find m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (gets s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
step_consume_other : forall (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (gets s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
is_active = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
is_consumed = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
find_consume : forall (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (id : mid) (m : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (gets i k)) -> getl n (gets (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (gets i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
prod_ordType = fun K T : ordType => Ordered.Pack {| Ordered.base := prod_eqMixin K T; Ordered.mixin := prod_ordMixin K T |} : ordType -> ordType -> ordType
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (axioms.dynamic id)
rely_loc : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_rely s1 s2 -> find this (dstate (gets s1 l)) = find this (dstate (gets s2 l))
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getl n (gets s lc)) (getl n (gets s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (gets s l)
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [w : world this : nid l : Label s : state s' : state m : mid tm : TaggedMessage to : nat b : bool |- Type]
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (gets s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (gets s1 l)) = find z (dstate (gets s2 l))
umpleq_some : forall (K : ordType) (A : Type) (U : union_map_class K A) (x1 x2 : U) (t : K) (s : A), valid x2 -> [pcm x1 <= x2] -> find t x1 = Some s -> find t x2 = Some s
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}

```coq
intros b'.
exists b'.
split.
- assumption.
- intros H.
apply rely_loc with s s' l.
assumption.
rewrite H.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros b'. exists b'. split. - auto. - intros H. apply rely_loc with s s' l. auto. rewrite H. reflexivity.
